website_summaries.verdict: Extremely low price point for a basic sports watch – a simple, straightforward choice.
pros: Good value in a basic men's sports watch
Customers report the watch is comfortable to wear and lightweight
You can easily switch between 7 different LED back light colors
cons: Some customers don't like the large size of the watch face versus other men's watches

customer_reviews.title: Talk about durable
customer_reviews.text: This watch has held up very well for the last year. It's been covered in water, oil, and blood but still runs strong like the day I got it. If you're wondering about the blood it's been from the last two deer I've gotten. During the gutting stages of processing the deer I'd forgotten that my watch was still on BOTH times somehow and I'm proud to say this watch was durable enough to withstand being soaked in blood. Not sure if that's a selling point but it's a testament to it's strength.
customer_reviews.author: Storm Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Fine, inexpensive digital watch, just a lot larger than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is fine and was packaged nicely and delivered promptly. The price is tough to beat. I did not realize how BIG it is from the picture. perhaps if the watch was displayed in a photo where someone is wearing it I would have seen the largeness of it. It was relatively easy to set up and it's really only the size/styling that is responsible for the 3 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: H B

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money! I purchased this for work when I work in classified areas and not able to wear my Apple Watch. I bought it months ago and it’s been sitting in a drawer since. I took it out a week ago for work to use it for the first time and after day 3 the digital numbers were disappearing. The light stayed on and I would have to hit the face for the numbers to reappear and the light turn off. Then I realized it was telling the wrong time. Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: F. S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable as well
customer_reviews.text: Wore this through Army basic combat training and it held up very well. Most everyone else's watches were falling apart and breaking, but this watch is very durable and I didn't have to worry about remembering to take it off to shower. Comfortable as well. I liked that I could change the backlighting because some of the colors were a bit blinding after waking up in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice watch didn’t come in box like picture just a plastic bag like if you got it from a cheap store unfortunately but other then that it’s decent.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 12 year old son (although a person much older would love it) and he loves it!! Very nice quality and features especially for the low price. A wonderful item!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch. Lightweight! Stylish. It was very easy to program. It was bought as a gift which the recipient thoroughly enjoyed. They especially liked the light feature.
customer_reviews.author: Sheba

customer_reviews.title: Button doesn't work within a few days after receive
customer_reviews.text: Start button doesn't work after 3 days of using it and it made impossible to change time or set an alarm. I try to return it and it says 'This item isn't eligible for return.'. I ask seller to provide a solution for this.
customer_reviews.author: parco

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch just runs I little slow.
customer_reviews.text: It runs a little slow, it loses about 10 to 15 seconds each week.
customer_reviews.author: Jef

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, have been using it for some months ...
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, have been using it for some months now,still looks great and works great. Worn it to the beach a couple times and swam with it on and no problems water proof as described by sellers.I recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon S

customer_reviews.title: Still holding up
customer_reviews.text: Held up over a year, it was cheaper than buying a battery for a new one def got moneys worth
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: This watch was fine for the first few weeks but before a month was up, two separate buttons stopped working so the time cannot be set and the alarm cannot be changed so it goes off at midnight every night now. We were not able to return it. I'm not sure why they said it was ineligible for returns. Too bad. My son was dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 11 year old son. He loves it. I like it so much that I might order another for myself. Looks very similar to a much more expensive Casio.
customer_reviews.author: J. Oelmann

customer_reviews.title: Defective and Can't Return
customer_reviews.text: The lights on this watch do not all work and we apparently cannot return it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: HealthyMama

customer_reviews.title: The watch is very nice I bought two but one of them is seem ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very nice I bought two but one of them is seem tone coming apart the other is OK I gave one away so I ended up with the one that's coming apart I'll recommended others to buy it but I don't think I'll re order ,they need to replace the damage one first
customer_reviews.author: Krishna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice watch, but the crystal was fogged up permanently after spraying myself wtih but spray.
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch for the money, but the crystal was fogged up permanently after spraying myself wtih but spray. Aside from the plastic not holding up to bug spray the watch is huge.
customer_reviews.author: stuart portoghese

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a good buy until my son developed a rash on his hand
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline D.

customer_reviews.title: An okay product.
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is still working after a couple of months. However, the light died after a week of getting it. The strap is pretty comfy and a decent watch overall.
customer_reviews.author: J. Duwady

customer_reviews.title: Cool Watch!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this watch. He is 10 and a little bit tall for his age. But he really loves the big face and all the features that this watch affords him. It also has super cool lighting options. I would recommend it for anyone age 10 to 30, depending on individual style. It arrived quickly, and is impressively affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honestly a good watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a good watch for the price. Bought it a month ago, been in and out of the shower with it, putting alarms on, and using the stop watch all the time. Still works great, no problems at all. Like how there are different colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: marshall a.

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT have a timer!
customer_reviews.text: Well after reading reviews and faq questions about this watch I purchased it needing a timer because I am a referee and need it tomorrow. The product says it has a timer.....nope just a stopwatch...my money was wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Rodites

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, I use it for work everyday and works great
customer_reviews.author: Robert Furcal

customer_reviews.title: Nice-looking
customer_reviews.text: Really nice-looking watch for the price! Purchased for my nephew as a Christmas gift. I know he will love it!
customer_reviews.author: JLee

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Looks like a More Expensive Watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch, I bought for kayaking & other water sports. It looks like a more expensive watch, & have recommended it to a couple of people have asked about it. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis O.

customer_reviews.title: I do like the watch
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much for writing back, I had told myself I was going to leave a comment. I had forgotten. Yes! I do like the watch. I love it how it has a amor that protects the watch. The lights are very cool and stylish it is. I'm thinking in getting a Casio watch. Those are nice to. I'm enjoying the watch. Thank you,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: DONT EVER BUY A G SHOCK OR FOSSIL WHATEVER GET THIS IT WORKS ANS WORKS WELL
customer_reviews.author: Carl Anderson

customer_reviews.title: ... for a 12 year old boy he says its perfect for what he needs
customer_reviews.text: This was for a 12 year old boy he says its perfect for what he needs, he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Read the guide !
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know how to work it at first but it looks okay I guess
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Watch good material excellent for exports and daily use A+
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Z.

customer_reviews.title: As far as he feels happy, that makes me happy too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my ten year old son. As far as he feels happy, that makes me happy too. It looks like a sturdy, easy to operate, and nice watch.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: I bought this watch for my husband. He is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband. He is a firefighter and needed a watch that was water resistant. He is very impressed with the quality and functionality of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Huici

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for the price with a lot of great features as well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for the price. Like the backlight. Accurate beefy multi-function sports watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Adams

customer_reviews.title: It is so comfortable and perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is so comfortable and perfect! I didn't expect that my watch has a light of different colors, which is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Tirzah Farley

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Well built ,easy to read . My son loves it .
customer_reviews.author: Kitchclan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. My husband is now like a kid with new toys.
customer_reviews.author: Neida

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My man loves it! He loves all the different lighting settings and the big face.
customer_reviews.author: Teegan

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: A little big for my 10 year old son but he loves it. Great watch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Webster

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the watch although a little big for his narrow wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my teenager. Great looking and does the job at a heck of a price!! Haven't water tested it yet but I'm sure it will hold up just fine. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lois C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it! It looks just like a G-Shock! It is a perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely not a boy's watch. It's even very large for a man. Am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch at the end of November 2017. I used it few times a week when i swam or exercised. Its done in 3 months! Broken, buttons stopped working. Its a cheap watch and its cheaply done. I will not experiment with watches anymore and hope that if you read this I will save you some pocket change. If you really want to buy a cheap watch go get the cheap CASIO watch that will last you years, its $10 and cheaper than this garbage! and if you want big screen Casio has that too, only $16.00.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: not living up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: i hate it because it doesn't have one of the features that it boasts to the left of the watch which is a count down feature on the watch. and i'm having a representative debating with me through email that it doesn't say that but i have sent the picture 2 times to the same email address letting them know what color the feature that is talked about and the whole nine yards. please send me a watch with the count down feature that it says that it has. thank you ryan handy, disgruntled customer
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Handy

customer_reviews.title: A lot nicer then I expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend because he's a skater, amongst other things lol, but he always breaks his nice watches! So I decided to get him this cheap one so I don't get so upset buying him expensive Invicta watches for him to bust bombing a hill in OB.... But I was really impressed with the quality of this watch. We got the black one with white accents and it looks very clean and rugged at the same time. It is a little more bulky then expected but he didn't care because it isn't as heavy as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son picked it out and it is exactly what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and a gorgeous, inexpensive watch
customer_reviews.text: Even though being inexpensive, this watch is fabulous! Setting it up is easy, it's accurate and very nice looking at. I recommend it for buying.
customer_reviews.author: Uriel G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s funny, I have 2 $80-$100 skeleton watches which I love, and I buy this watch for practical purposes and now it’s my favorite watch. Looks way more expensive than it is too.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Graham

customer_reviews.title: Time check
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice watch and I do like the colors for the back ground. I did end up being a bit thicker that I thought it would be, but not a big deal there. I also like that the face has big numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Jalazz

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it! It came quickly and with the instructions
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it ! It came quickly and with the instructions, I was able to set it up quickly. Have used it in the swimming pool and even in the shower and it it is water resistent / waterproof as promised. The choice of seven back-light colors is a very cool extra.Highly recommend it especially at this pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Manny Simon

customer_reviews.title: A digital (non Analog) watch with Time, Alarm, and Stopwatch.
customer_reviews.text: A digital (non Analog) watch with Time, Alarm, and Stopwatch. Minus one point for being so very large (too big for anyone except a full size man).
customer_reviews.author: Meg-Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son. He isn't a big watch person but he wanted one that he could wear all the time and not have to worry about it getting wet or ruined if he banged it by accident. Nice and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Expectations met
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple digital watch with a timer function and this fits my expectations exactly. Plus the back light makes the face very easy to read
customer_reviews.author: Greg Savage

customer_reviews.title: Looks as advertised and works smoothly. I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks as advertised and works smoothly. I use it when running my bootcamp twice a week especially for the stopwatch function.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Brown

customer_reviews.title: Actually I bought this watch for my nephew, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually I bought this watch for my nephew, and he likes it very much! I would be ordering another one for me in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the watch and it was easy to set
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch and it was easy to set. I purchased the watch as a x-mas present for my 10yr old son.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, lights up beautifully at night and very easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Very simple watch... sturdy, lights up beautifully at night and very easy to see in the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The watch was a gift to a friend and he ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch was a gift to a friend and he loves it. It's user friendly and can handle a sweaty workout.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Queen14

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and I'm sure my husband will love it.
customer_reviews.author: trisha ladd

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love my watch it is water resistant as stated. The multiple light color is cool as well.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my grandson, he absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it is
customer_reviews.text: Is it for kids? I like it but it is simple
customer_reviews.author: Susan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift for my 11 y/o son and he loves it, wears it all the time. We had to convince him not to wear when sleeping. Looks big on his wrist because he's so skinny so there's plenty for him to grow into.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Too big for a 10-year-old boy
customer_reviews.text: This watch is way to big for a kid. I will be returning it
customer_reviews.author: wayne brzoska

product_meta.title: Aposon Mens Digital Sports Watch, Military Army Electronic Watches Running 50M 5 ATM Waterproof Sports LED 7 Colour Wristwatch Water Resistant with Stopwatch
product_meta.description:
Highlights: 
Precise Time Keeping: Imported IC Chip Set 

12/24H Supported Electronic Dial 

Shower, Handwash, Swimming, No Problem! 50M 5ATM Water Resistant(Lifetime waterproof, not suitable for long time underwater activities such as diving. Please DONOT press any buttons underwater) 

7 Color LED Back Lights (Long Press Top Left Button to Change Color): Purple, Green, Red, Blue, Rose, Yellow, Grey 

Comfortable Soft PU Band Strap 

Durable Stainless Steel Case Back Cover and Buckle 

Calendar Date, Week, Month 

Alarm and Hourly Chime 

Stopwatch Timer: 1/100 Second Chronograph with Split Functions 

Shock Resistant, Suitable for All Kind of Outdoor and Indoor Sports 

Material: 
Case Front: Plastic 
Cast Back Cover: Stainless Steel 
Band Material: PU (Polyurethane) 
Watch Face: High Transparent Resin Glass 

Specification: 
Band Color: Black 
Band Width: 1.10 inch / 2.8 cm 
Band Length: 9.65 inch / 24.5 cm 
Case Thickness: 0.71 inch / 1.8 cm 
Case Diameter: 1.26 inch / 3.2 cm 
Max Perimeter: 8.66 inch / 22 cm 
Min Perimeter: 5.91 inch / 15 cm 
Product Weight: 2.05 oz / 58 g 
Battery Code: CR2025 

What Is In The Package: 
Mens Digital Backlight Sports Watch x 1 
User Manual x 1 

**NOTE**: 
Please DONOT Press Any Buttons Underwater. Also avoid the use in extreme hot or cold temperature. 
If mist or droplets found inside watch surface, please contact us immediately for maintenance to prevent moisture corrosion of the internal components. 
Clean the strap by a soft cloth on regular bases is highly recommended. 
Too much water contact will shorter watch life.
feature_bullets: PRECISE TIME KEEPING: Imported IC Chip Set provides precise and accurate time keeping. Time is super easy to read with high transparency resin watch face and clear digital dial.

DESIGN for SPORT: 50M 5ATM water resistant shock resistant, stop watch, military 24H time mode, and 7 color LED back light functions make it perfect for all kind of sport and daily use. It is also a great gift for family, friends and your kids.

7 COLOR LED BACKLIGHT with COMFORT BAND STRAP. 7 color bright LED back lights (long press top left button to change) makes time reading super easy and fun, soft imported PU watch band bring comfortable wearing experience.

50M 5ATM WATERPROOF, SWIMMING, SHOWER, HANDWASH, RAIN, SWEAT, NO PROBLEM! MULTI-FUNCTIONAL with STOPWATCH, ALARM, BACK LIGHT. 50M 5ATM Water resistant, make it perfect for all kind of indoor and outdoor sports, activities or daily use. Calendar Date, Week, Day, Alarm, Stopwatch, Clean Digital Display, LED Back Light, Shock Resistant, this is a great value watch you don't want to miss. NOTE: please DO NOT press any button in the water.
What Is In The Package: Mens Digital Backlight Sports Watch x 1, User Manual x 1
